title: Order object
description: Account orders hold a collection of lines. The account owns the orders and the order owns the lines.

properties.description: $schema only included to aid validation of JSON, should not be used in real calls.

accountid.title: Account ID
accountid.description: The ID of the account that identifies the advertiser and buyer that own the order.

advertiserbrandid.title: Advertiser Brand ID
advertiserbrandid.description: The id of the AdvertiserBrand being advertised.

brand.title: Brand
brand.description: A descriptive name for the brand being advertised.

contacts.description: A list of one or more contacts with the organisation.

currency.title: Currency
currency.description: The currency that all monetary properties of the order and lines are specified in.

enddate.title: Order
enddate.description: The date and time that the order will end.

orderexpirydate.title: Order Expiry Date
orderexpirydate.description: The date and time using the ISO 8601 format for when the order expires. Publisher will only hold inventory up until the date and time indicated.

id.title: Id of Order
id.description: A system-generated opaque ID that uniquely identifies this resource.

name.title: Order Name
name.description: The order's display name. The name must be unique.

orderstatus.title: Order Status
orderstatus.description: Specifies the Status of the order.

packageonly.title: Package Only
packageonly.description: Identifies whether the order is only available as a package or if specific items can be separated from the inventory.

providerdata.description: An opaque CLOB of provider-defined data.

publisherid.description: The ID of the Publisher providing this order.

specialinstructions.title: Special Instructions
specialinstructions.description: Free text box to capture any special intructions relating to the order.

startdate.description: The date and time that the order will start.
